name: Puo (beta)
description:
Ever experienced greatness?, download Puo so you can use "of course" as your answer.

A magical mix of passion and fun on a totally well made videogame. 

Take care of Puo, play with him, live as him, discover his house, his favorite hobbies and turn your day into a hope of a new, bright sunrise as you become one with Puo.

Disclaimer: The project uploaded is a Beta released on December 30th 2020, the images are from versions ahead on the development of the game.
